code: import React from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{currentUser,isClient,userRole,loading}=useAuth();console.log('üõ°Ô∏è ProtectedRoute verificando acceso:',{currentUser:currentUser===null||currentUser===void 0?void 0:currentUser.email,userRole,isClient:isClient(),loading});if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Cargando..."});}if(!currentUser){console.log('üö´ ProtectedRoute: No hay usuario, redirigiendo a login');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true});}if(!isClient()){console.log('üö´ ProtectedRoute: Usuario no es cliente/admin, redirigiendo a home');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/",replace:true});}console.log('‚úÖ ProtectedRoute: Acceso permitido');return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
